short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: schedule WhatsApp messages, manage tasks on WhatsApp, and launch WhatsApp campaigns and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PrismTicks is an advanced WhatsApp CRM extension designed to help businesses enhance customer communication and streamline management. Whether you're looking to boost engagement or improve customer service, PrismTicks offers a seamless solution for integrating WhatsApp into your CRM workflow.
